description: Information used to communicate with consumer including email, phone, and postal address
examples: Email Address|Phone Number|Postal Address|Business Address|Contact Phone

description: Data used for identification purposes including names, identifiers, and document numbers
examples: First Name|Last Name|Full Name|Customer ID|Passport Number|Driver License Number

description: Data about personal characteristics such as age, gender, race, and marital status
Data related to financial status, accounts, and transactions
examples: Bank Account Number|Credit Card Number|Income|Financial Accounts|Transaction History|Credit Score

description: Data related to physical or mental health condition, medical records, and health history
gdpr_equivalent: Article 9(1) - Special categories requiring explicit consent
examples: Medical Diagnosis|Health Condition|Prescription|Medical Records|Health Insurance|Medical Provider

description: Data about geographical location and movement patterns including precise geolocation
gdpr_equivalent: Article 9 - Special category when combined with personal data
examples: GPS Coordinates|Home Address|Work Address|Travel History|Movement Patterns|Location Timestamp

description: Biometric data for identification including fingerprints, facial features, and iris scans
Data about online and offline behavior, browsing history, and activity patterns
examples: Browsing History|Purchase History|Search Queries|Website Activity|Click Patterns|Usage Statistics

description: Information about devices and network identifiers used by consumer
gdpr_equivalent: Article 4(1) - Personal data when linked to individual
examples: IP Address|Device ID|MAC Address|Device Type|Operating System|Browser Type|Cookies

description: Data related to employment status, job title, employer, and professional background
Data about educational background, qualifications, and learning history
examples: School Name|Degree|GPA|Graduation Date|Certification|Field of Study|Education History

description: Data about social connections, relationships, and family information
examples: Family Members|Relationships|Social Network Connections|Emergency Contacts|Spouse Info|Children Info
